welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Mead Valley, where the charm of small-town America meets the beauty of Southern California. Get ready to explore our quaint streets, taste our delicious cuisine, and discover all the hidden gems this city is known for. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Fla-Bob Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Riverside Fla-Bob Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Municipal Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ryan Field Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ryan Field Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights and is home to several major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves international flights and is home to several major airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Banning Airport serves all domestic flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Banning Airport handles all international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminals.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barstow-Daggett Airport offers a variety of services for travelers, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and dining options.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Barstow-Daggett Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a comfortable waiting area and private lounges for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cable Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cable Airport caters to private and chartered flights.
